notes.text:
An update is available for kernel.
This update affects Rocky Linux SIG Cloud 9.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The kernel packages contain the Linux kernel, the core of any Linux operating system.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: use-after-free vulnerability in the smb client component (CVE-2023-5345)

* kernel: IGB driver inadequate buffer size for frames larger than MTU (CVE-2023-45871)

* hw amd: Return Address Predictor vulnerability leading to information disclosure (CVE-2023-20569)

* kernel: use-after-free in smb2_is_status_io_timeout() (CVE-2023-1192)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

This advisory is provided by CIQ Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RHSA-RXSA-2023:7749

remediations.details:
Apply the security update for CRLSA-RXSA-2023:7749 by updating the affected packages using your Rocky Linux from CIQ package manager.

For Rocky Linux from CIQ systems, run:
sudo dnf update

Or update specific packages:
sudo dnf update bpftool kernel kernel-64k kernel-64k-core kernel-64k-debug kernel-64k-debug-core kernel-64k-debug-devel kernel-64k-debug-devel-matched kernel-64k-debug-modules kernel-64k-debug-modules-core kernel-64k-debug-modules-extra kernel-64k-devel kernel-64k-devel-matched kernel-64k-modules kernel-64k-modules-core kernel-64k-modules-extra kernel-abi-stablelists kernel-core kernel-cross-headers kernel-debug kernel-debug-core kernel-debug-devel kernel-debug-devel-matched kernel-debug-modules kernel-debug-modules-core kernel-debug-modules-extra kernel-devel kernel-devel-matched kernel-doc kernel-headers kernel-modules kernel-modules-core kernel-modules-extra kernel-tools kernel-tools-libs kernel-tools-libs-devel perf python3-perf rtla

After updating, verify the installed package versions are greater thanor equal to those specified in this advisory.
